parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword for the query. Fuzzy match is supported by disaster recovery plan name.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language in which you want the values of some response parameters to be returned. These response parameters support multiple languages.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. The page number starts from **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **20**.
